name: ONC Master (One Signal Notification Controller)
author: Piclaunch

sections.description:
Report any issue to our Github page.
Support at our Github.

This plugins will send “Category” of the post as the Tag of the users of your post to your onesignal account, only if user allow to recevie Push notification from your website. Enable Tags for post page and custom posts for your one signal user data, and send notification using tags.

It would help you to send push notification to only those people who have visited those catagory in past due to your business need.

Plugin let you decide if you also want to send the notification to your full audiences at the Post Level.

ONCE Master, let you enable push notification for your pages as well in the settings.

You may like:

  1. Send Tag for each page and post and custom post types
  2. Send push notification to only people having the respective Tags
  3. Ability to send message to all of your users bypassing all filters
  4. More data about what your users view on your site
  5. Let you send push notificaiton for Pages
  6. You will also know what pages are viewed by your users
  7. Ability send Yost Desc as the message in Push notification
  8. More to come, you can also send your request/query piclaunch@gmail.com

Report any issue to our Github page.
Support at our Github.
sections.faq:
Do I need ONE Signal Main plugin ?

Yes, as of now this plugin works as an addon to the One Signal

Is it free ?

Yes .

I am not able to see any change in one signal account for users.

Feel free to write at piclaunch@gmail.com or use support forum of this plugin to post your query.

Any question wite us piclaunch@gamil.com

Find out more at http://www.piclaunch.com

Follow us on Twitter: @piclaunch

short_description: This plugin is an addon to OneSignal, offres segmenting your one signal user's data by Tag for your Pages post and Customs Post.
description:
Report any issue to our Github page.
Support at our Github.

This plugins will send “Category” of the post as the Tag of the users of your post to your onesignal account, only if user allow to recevie Push notification from your website. Enable Tags for post page and custom posts for your one signal user data, and send notification using tags.

It would help you to send push notification to only those people who have visited those catagory in past due to your business need.

Plugin let you decide if you also want to send the notification to your full audiences at the Post Level.

ONCE Master, let you enable push notification for your pages as well in the settings.

You may like:

  1. Send Tag for each page and post and custom post types
  2. Send push notification to only people having the respective Tags
  3. Ability to send message to all of your users bypassing all filters
  4. More data about what your users view on your site

  8. More to come, you can also send your request/query piclaunch@gmail.com
